text: Hi, I  have a page with two buttons that when clicked open a different popup cta with form , so i have two possible cta's opening in the page, but it only let me open the last updated cta, anyone knows why? It is possible to open different popup cta's in the same page or not? Thanks!
Hey <@U073724UWFN> I’m an engineer on the CTA’s team, can you share the page and I’ll have a look

Hi Conor, thanks :slightly_smiling_face: the page is <https://HubSpot.findmore.solutions/>

the orange buttons should open different popup cta's, but only the 'Get a free audit' it's opening. The strange thing is when I tested on my mobile phone, it opens correctly the cta's :confused:

Hello, in my landing page, the banner at the top is not displaying in the mobile view. Could you please help me figure out how to fix this issue? I can attach a screenshot with my URL as well to show the problem.
Thanks

Hello All,

I am using the HubL variable `{% request.geoip_country %}`, and it was returning the correct output until a few days ago. Recently, it has been consistently returning 'us' regardless of the VPN region I am connected to. Is there any issue on HubSpot's side?

Can anybody help ?

hello! does anyone know if the responsive image implementation (inputting width value to get automatically responsive sized images) of the images stored in hubdb the same as the ones uploaded to the HubSpot modules? all my images are responsive but the ones i have to fetch from hubdb aren't :confused:
how do you add images to the HubDB? Via image field oder differently(there are some other ways)?
We’ve been having trouble with `request.query_dict` over the last few days. It suddenly stopped working in two different portals. Is something up with HubL’s `request` variable at the moment?
